text: Vakha Abuevich Agaev (15 March 1953 – 23 September 2020) was a Russian politician, who, since 2011, had been a Member of the State Duma, representing the Krasnoyarsk region. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation. He served as Deputy Chairman of the State Duma committee on property. He died of COVID-19 in 2020. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Communist Party of the Russian Federation members Category:Members of the State Duma (Russian Federation) Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia Category:People who died in office
title: Vakha Agaev
